name: Brush it Up!
description:
A nice game about brushing your teeth, don’t let the tooth rot set in!

A mouse is (basically) required.

==== Controls ====

Move the mouse to brush your teeth

Double click on a different view to zoom in on that part of the mouth.

==== Credits ====

Font: https://www.dafont.com/cafe-matcha.font

Else: Kory
